column1: According to the Momosame sisters,
it should be around this area.
Sneaking into Gensokyo as you please
is not a trivial issue that I can oversee!
Reimu, someone’s coming!
Nice to meet you,
fellow residents of Gensokyo.
And you are?
I am Kirigakure Rika.
This is my first time visiting Gensokyo, so please take care of me.
Then you are that mysterious intruder!
What do you mean by intruder? Don't you think that's a bit harsh?
This is your first time coming to Gensokyo, and you’ve been causing us much trouble.
I will have you know our law in Gensokyo!
Oh?
That’s interesting.
Could it be that you two are Gensokyo's guard dogs?
Reimu! This girl…
It seems like you really want to get exterminated!
Oh?
I’ve been in high spirits ever since I came here.
Well then, residents in Gensokyo,
what surprise have you brought for me today?
How about an unforgettable moment in your life!
Shinmyoumaru, let’s do this!
That’s the spirit! Now this is getting interesting.
Well then, I will only use a quarter of my strength,
and bury the both of you in this sea of flowers!
